examples: There has also been a shift in the places where repro is carried out.

entries.meaning: (printing) The proof prepared in offset printing, with all elements positioned on the page.
examples: This reproduction proof, commonly called the repro, is sent to the designer for pasting on to the mechanical.

entries.meaning: (informal, computing) A method for reproducing a bug or problem.

verbs.description: repro (third-person singular simple present repros, present participle reproing, simple past and past participle reproed)

entries.meaning: (informal, computing) To reproduce (a bug or problem).
examples: We cannot repro the bug in the latest version, so we are marking it as fixed.
